data.title: Mike Bryan: Tennis Profile
data.meta_description: Explore the life of USA tennis sensation Mike Bryan, detailing his birthday, career, accolades, family, and statistics, exclusively on Sportsmatik.
data.text:
Michael Carl Bryan (Mike) is an American professional tennis player who was born on April 29th, 1978. Mike is two minutes elder than his twin brother Bob Bryan. Mike has won more than 100 junior doubles titles. He was ranked No.1 in U.S. Boys' 18s in 1996. With his brother Bob, the Bryan brothers are known for being the best tennis team in doubles in history. Mike and Bob have been world No. 1 doubles players in tennis for more than nine years. Bryan Brothers first achieved the No.1 ranking in 2003, and they became the second team in men's doubles to complete the career Golden Slam by winning the 2012 Summer Olympics.

Major Achievements-
